name: Row Game Match 3
description:
Match 3 game with software icons.

This is also downloadable as android game file.

Game was made using Unity, i also used Paint.net

Music: Kabbalistic Village - Borrow the Happiness - Funky Asian/Indian Electronic Music

Icons: most found here Icon Archive and then i edited them a bit with paint.net

Font: HVD Comic Serif

Game is based on the tutorial by Jeff Fisher Match 3 Game in Unity
